name: "Mallorca Landscape" by Joaquim Mir Trinxet
description:
Technical Information.

Autor: Joanquim Mir Trinxet
Title: Mallorca Landscape
Size: 60x71 cm
Technique: Oil on Canvas
Signed: Yes
Price: 145.500,00€ (before 195.500,00€)

This Painting is perfect for the Balear Islands Lovers and specially for whom enjoy the biggest spanish island, Mallorca, where Mir lived for many gratefully years.

Mir is one of the most famous catalan Painters from all times. Is not joke put on "paper" the feelings, wind and lights man can live on that sometimes snowy mountains called "Serra de Tramuntana".

On their valleys live personalities like Michael Douglas and Catherine Z. Jones or maybe You as well.

This is the perfect Painting to feel Yourself strong. Keeping the Wildness of that Mountains fixed and under control between the walls of Your sweet warm Home. 

More Pics.
https://www.dropbox.com/s/kosp5u3qzotb7np/firma%20mir0002.JPG

Albert Gispert Ganduxer
kunstwerkauktionen.blogspot.de

name: "Playing Golf" by Francesc Domingo Segura
description:
Technical Information.

Autor: Francesc Domingo Segura
Title: Playing Golf
Size: 100x80 cm
Technique: Oil on Canvas 
Signed: Yes
Price: 34.500,00€ (before 49.500,00€)

This Painter was absolutely influenced by Cézanne during his first times. Then, in Paris, got some coloration skills from cubism to come back to Barcelona and discover the simplicity of the social life and the plane worker hobbies. 

This Painting is just that. An instantane photo taken under a creamy suggesting atmosphere to show the balance between men and their mundane hobbies of all times, like Golf.

If You are a Golf Lover, You may know this is the Painting you need on your Saloon: Big size, clear colours, classic soul, smart movements and, ofcourse, green fields. 

More Pics.
https://www.dropbox.com/s/93lq362jeeqfw5o/francesc_domingo.zip

Albert Gispert Ganduxer
kunstwerkauktionen.blogspot.de

name: "Still Life" of Xavier Nogués
description:
Technical Information.

Autor: Xavier Nogués
Title: Still Life
Size: 32x40 cm
Technique: Oil on Canvas 
Signed: Yes
Dated: Yes. 1939
Price:  14.500,00€ (before 19.500,00€)


Nogués have Paintings permanently exposed on the walls of the Barcelona Government Hall(Ajuntament de Barcelona).

This one have more than 20 colour variations. It's wonderfully painted, show simply objects in a complex way of painting.

More Pics.
https://www.dropbox.com/s/djn4gkxujr5ht3r/xavier_nogues.zip

Albert Gispert Ganduxer
